body: Y'know, ntr'ing someone and making them leave is one thing, but the audacity of this bitch to ask for the guy to comeback is something else. He made the right move, this girl is nothing but a slut now.
This bitch isn't worth slaying the metaphorical dragon to save anyway, not many would be worth it now that I think about it.

Shuu-kun is one of the rare NTR male leads that made exactly the right move. Just walk away. Too many characters and even RL people read NTR and think the male lead should somehow fix everything, maybe beat someone up and take back the girl. That's retarded and a loser move.  Plenty of fish in the sea, no reason to get fixated on one like this

@aromah You think like a cuck and your comment makes me cringe you fucking incel. Keep dreaming dude. And just for your information: most who love NTR don't identify with the one who gets cucked, they either identify with the ones who cuck or just like to see girls who fall in to the lust.

Here's an alternative. You gather up your courage. You slay the dragon. Many girls want you. You fuck some girls, but then you realize that your life is more than just about fucking (it's just a what-if scenario. hey, maybe you don't). 
So what do you do? You lived the life of the virgin hero. You saved the princess. You saved the princess again. You've done it many times. You realize, there's more to life than just saving and fucking princesses.
How do you know this? You know this because you notice a girl that's not like all the other princesses. In fact, she's not a princess, nor a girl. She's a woman. She's intelligent, her life is constantly moving. You sense within her that she actually has a purpose in her life. 
So what do you do? You tell yourself this: I'm no longer going to look for princesses in need of saving. I'm going to find a queen that'll fight by my side. And as two superpowers working as one unit, we'll be more grand than we've ever been. We'll save the world.

Let's take this story for example. You are "Shuu-chan" (since the narrative role of the protagonist is to be relatable to the viewer) and the gyaru girl gets knocked up by "Oji-san." She gets pregnant with his kids. You are an ntr-loving cuck, so you disregard that and continue to be attracted to her anyway. Then you stick around like a beta provider, so you can take care of her and raise her child -that's *ahem* not yours-
What is the reason behind it? You don't know. Your dick just told you it was a good idea and you believed him.

If you want someone to bang the person you are attracted to, why not just kill yourself?  :D
Because literally that's what it means to be a cuck evolutionary. You have the person you're attracted to be fucked by another guy, and then she gets pregnant with his kids. You have no offsprings. No one to continue your bloodline. So why not just kill yourself!
